solution_line_template: One hour is {minutes_per_hour} minutes, so there can be {minutes_per_hour} / {actor_time_per_set} = <<{minutes_per_hour}/{actor_time_per_set}={num_sets_of_actors}>>{num_sets_of_actors} different sets of actors.
This means, that during one hour there can be {num_sets_of_actors} * {actors_per_set} = <<{num_sets_of_actors}*{actors_per_set}={total_actors}>>{total_actors} different actors in the show.
